about.details:
Incorporated in 2013, CKP Leisure Limited is Mumbai based company engaged in the business of leisure market in India comprising of night clubs, fine dining restaurants, banquet halls, etc. Company operates SIRKUS, one of the well known night club's in Mumbai in the iconic Hotel Sahara Star. Company focuses on providing its guests a premium night club experience with quality food and beverages and service in a modern ambience.

SIRKUS, the high-end nightclub was launched in 2016. The nightclub is built in 5,000 square feet with a dance floor, high-energy lighting, VIP bottle service and some of the best beats and entertainment. Club SIRKUS is open on Wednesday, Thursday, Friday and Saturday nights from 10:00 p.m. to close. The club requires its guests to follow a dress code which adds on to the glamour and nightlife experience.

In July 2015, company made an investment in a partnership firm named M/s. Athena Restaurant and Bar, and took over the operations and management of a restaurant and a night club named ‘Saizen’ and ‘Club Athena’ at Colaba in Mumbai. The name of these Restaurant later changed to ‘जा:pani’ (a Japanese cuisine restaurant) and ‘Club Alibii’.

The Company has recently acquired 14,542 sq. feet of property on lease at Pinnacle mall in Nashik where in company is planning to setup and operate a banquet hall having a guest capacity of approx 500 persons.

faqs.question: What is the CKP Leisure IPO?
faqs.answer:
CKP Leisure IPO is a SME IPO of 3848000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹11.54 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹30 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on February 21, 2018, and closes on February 23, 2018.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in CKP Leisure IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in CKP Leisure IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in CKP Leisure IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in CKP Leisure IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'CKP Leisure IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When CKP Leisure IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The CKP Leisure IPO opens on February 21, 2018 and closes on February 23, 2018.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of CKP Leisure IPO?
faqs.answer: CKP Leisure IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for CKP Leisure IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in CKP Leisure IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is CKP Leisure IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for CKP Leisure IPO will be done on Wednesday, February 28, 2018, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, March 5, 2018. Check the CKP Leisure IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is CKP Leisure IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The CKP Leisure IPO listing date is on Tuesday, March 6, 2018.
